org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq

Enum FastqQualityCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<FastqQualityCodec>
      • org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq.FastqQualityCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<FastqQualityCodec>

    public enum FastqQualityCodec
extends Enum<FastqQualityCodec>
    FastqQualityCodec is a can encode and decode The different ways a FASTQ file can be encode quality data.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ILLUMINA
      ILLUMINA supports Illumina 1.3 through Illumina 1.7 encoded qualities.
      SANGER
      SANGER supports Sanger encoded qualities.
      SOLEXA
      SOLEXA is a FastqQualityCodec that supports qualities not only encoded in FASTq solexa/Illumina format, but also the quality scores are in Solexa scale and not the Phred scale.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • ILLUMINA

        public static final FastqQualityCodec ILLUMINA
        ILLUMINA supports Illumina 1.3 through Illumina 1.7 encoded qualities. Illumina 1.8+ switched to sanger encoding.
        See Also:
        SANGER

      • SANGER

        public static final FastqQualityCodec SANGER
        SANGER supports Sanger encoded qualities. .

      • SOLEXA

        public static final FastqQualityCodec SOLEXA
        SOLEXA is a FastqQualityCodec that supports qualities not only encoded in FASTq solexa/Illumina format, but also the quality scores are in Solexa scale and not the Phred scale.

      • decode

        public QualitySequence decode(String fastqQualities)
        Decode the given FASTQ quality encoded String into the equivalent QualitySequence.
        Parameters:
        fastqQualities - the encoded qualities.
        Returns:
        a QualitySequence the decoded FASTQ quality values.

      • decode

        public QualitySequence decode(String fastqQualities,
                              boolean turnOffCompression)
        Decode the given FASTQ quality encoded String into the equivalent QualitySequence.
        Parameters:
        fastqQualities - the encoded qualities.
        turnOffCompression - true if the quality sequence to be built should disable additional processing to compress or compact the sequence in as little memory as possible. Turning off compression may have improve speed but take up more memory.
        Returns:
        a QualitySequence the decoded FASTQ quality values.

      • getOffset

        public int getOffset()
        Get the encoding offset used to encode the quality values. For example, for SANGER, this will return 33, for ILLUMINA, it will return 64.
        Returns:
        the encoding offset as an int.

      • decode

        public PhredQuality decode(char encodedQuality)

      • encode

        public char encode(PhredQuality quality)

      • encode

        public String encode(Sequence<PhredQuality> qualities)
        Encode the given qualities into a FASTQ quality encoded String.
        Parameters:
        qualities - the qualities to encode
        Returns:
        a String representing these quality values in the desired String encoding.
